about_the_game:
To execute her command “Bring Mankind happiness,”

Robot Rurumu hopes she can understand the "Happiness of Mankind" by becoming more human-like.

When she fights to protect Noruru Village,

she is on the journey of finding her “Fighting Style.”

Rurumu

Core Awakened Maid Robot

After Rurumu has the desire to “Live happily ever after with the Village Head,”

her core awakened and she became conscious.

However, that hindered her pursuit of the “Happiness of Mankind.”

To achieve her goal, she hopes she can become human-like one day.

Yet, in one incident, the Village Head was in danger,

even though they avoided the tragedy, she found out her incompetency in combat.

She then set her goal to "Protect the Village."

Kitsunetsuki Koharu

A War Shrine Maiden from Demon Slayer Institution

Demons haunt mankind all over the world,

but because of Demon Slayer Institution's active engagement,

regular people are not threatened by demons.

Kitsunestsuki Koharu has been trained to become a War Shrine Maiden since she was young,

her success is unparalleled among her peers,

but she has ended more corrupted shrine maidens than demons.

Her mind is tortured by having to kill her corrupted friends in battle.

However, the battle against demons goes on....

“If only I could become a heartless demon-slaying robot one day.”

Koharu thought to herself.

This is a side-scroller action game,

The characters can switch between different fighting styles that have respective features,

Choose your style tactically to counter various situations!

During missions, there are a variety of enemies and treasures,

finish mission challenges and aim for the highest score!

There are two playable characters,

each has unique fighting styles and enhancements,

there are also RPG elements such as equipment and equipment upgrades!
